bill.title: Mississippi Scholarships for Students with Disabilities Program; establish.
bill.description: An Act To Establish The Mississippi Scholarships For Students With Disabilities Program; To Provide Scholarship Vouchers For The Option Of Students With Disabilities To Attend A Public School Other Than The One To Which Assigned Or To Attend A Qualified Private School Of Choice; To Provide Eligibility Standards For The Scholarship Program; To Prescribe The Obligations Of The State Department Of Education And The Local School District In Which The Student Resides; To Provide Eligibility Standards For Private Schools; To Provide The Obligations Of Program Participants; To Provide For Scholarship Funding And Payment; To Waive Liability On The Part Of The State Or Local School District For Participation In The Program; To Authorize The State Board Of Education To Promulgate Rules To Administer The Program; And For Related Purposes.
